name: excommunication
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act of refusing to to allow someone to be involved in the Church, especially the Roman Catholic Church, and to take part in the ceremony of Communion: They received warnings that they were in danger of excommunication. Two pastors face church trials, suspensions, and excommunication. See
excommunicate
More examplesFewer examplesNo Catholic politician in this current election year has been threatened with excommunication. The recent excommunications came on the heels of three others last week.Church members who practised polygamy were threatened with excommunication.
